verses.name: Proverbs 11:18
verses.text: The wicked worketh a deceitful work: but to him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:19
verses.text: As righteousness tendeth to life: so he that pursueth evil pursueth it to his own death.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:20
verses.text: They that are of a froward heart are abomination to the Lord: but such as are upright in their way are his delight.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:21
verses.text: Though hand join in hand, the wicked shall not be unpunished: but the seed of the righteous shall be delivered.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:22
verses.text: As a jewel of gold in a swine’s snout, so is a fair woman which is without discretion.
